project_name: Terraform and AI Integration for Stable Diffusion
description: Integrating AWS services with Terraform to create a scalable, cost-optimized environment for image generation using Stable Diffusion. The infrastructure supports AI-based image generation with automated scaling and efficient cost management.

technologies_used.name: Terraform
technologies_used.description: Used for automating the setup and management of AWS resources.

technologies_used.name: AWS VPC & Subnets
technologies_used.description: Proficiency in configuring VPCs, subnets (public/private), and routing for secure network communications.

technologies_used.name: AWS Lambda
technologies_used.description: Serverless computing service for scalable request handling and image processing.

technologies_used.name: Stable Diffusion
technologies_used.description: AI model used for generating and fine-tuning images.

technologies_used.name: AWS EC2
technologies_used.description: Used for training the Stable Diffusion model with fine-tuning.

technologies_used.name: AWS DynamoDB
technologies_used.description: Managed NoSQL database for storing metadata related to model operations and user requests.

technologies_used.name: AWS S3
technologies_used.description: Object storage for managing user-specific image data.

technologies_used.name: Boto3
technologies_used.description: Python SDK for AWS service interactions, including S3.

infrastructure.name: Infrastructure Setup
infrastructure.description: Automated AWS resource management using Terraform.
steps: Set up AWS Amplify for frontend deployment.
Implemented Lambda functions for image processing and request handling.
Deployed EC2 instances for Stable Diffusion model training.
Set up DynamoDB for metadata management.

infrastructure.name: AI Generation Flow
infrastructure.description: Handling user requests for image generation and optimizing resource usage.
steps: User requests containing images are processed by Lambda functions.
Stable Diffusion model on EC2 generates images based on input.
Generated images are delivered to users with resources cleaned up after processing.

skills_required.name: Cloud Infrastructure
skills_required.description: Experience with AWS services such as Lambda, EC2, DynamoDB, and S3 for AI-based infrastructure.

skills_required.name: AI & Machine Learning
skills_required.description: Knowledge of Stable Diffusion for image generation and model fine-tuning.

skills_required.name: Cost Optimization
skills_required.description: Implemented automated scaling and cleanup mechanisms to optimize resource usage.

skills_required.name: Security
skills_required.description: Ensured secure handling of data using S3 and IAM roles for access control.
